metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23192

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP2

metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way samba implemented DCE/RPC. If a client to a Samba server sent a very large DCE/RPC request, and chose to fragment it, an attacker could replace later fragments with their own data, bypassing the signature requirements.
